Articles.Content: I just started playing a couple days ago. I've watches several tutorials and finally managed to get to orbit and back safely tonight. It wasn't a pretty orbit, but it was stable. I really need to set up a config for my auxiliary keypad and get throttle contril moved to my mouse buttons. I find using WASD to be awkward and cramped.

A stable orbit *is* a pretty orbit. As long as you're not hitting dirt or atmo, it'll do. 

Welcome to the forum.
Loads to learn on the forum, both real space stuff, and for the game. Welcome.
From small beginnings come great things! Congrats for achieving your first orbit!
